title: Evaluating the Role of LLMs in Enhancing User Experience in E-commerce
description: This thesis will assess how LLMs can improve user experience in e-commerce platforms through personalized recommendations and customer support. Current evaluations often focus on technical performance rather than user satisfaction and engagement, which are critical for e-commerce success.
motivation: With the rapid growth of online shopping, enhancing user experience is vital for retaining customers. By developing a comprehensive evaluation framework that prioritizes user experience, this research can provide insights into how LLMs can be effectively integrated into e-commerce, ultimately driving sales and customer loyalty.
milestones: Conduct a literature review on LLMs and user experience in e-commerce.
Define research questions and objectives based on the literature review.
Develop a research methodology for evaluating user experience.
Select e-commerce platforms for case studies.
Design surveys and interview questions for user feedback.
Recruit participants for user studies.
Collect data through surveys and user interviews.
Analyze collected data for patterns and insights.
Develop a framework for assessing user experience improvements.
Implement LLM-based solutions in selected e-commerce platforms.
Conduct user testing to gather feedback on LLM implementations.
Evaluate the impact of LLMs on user experience metrics.
Draw conclusions based on data analysis and user feedback.
Prepare a draft of the thesis document.
Receive feedback from supervisors and peers on the draft.
Revise the thesis based on received feedback.
Finalize the thesis document for submission.
Prepare and practice for the thesis defense presentation.
Conduct the thesis defense.
Submit the final thesis and any required documentation.
Reflect on the research process and identify areas for future work.
Publish findings in relevant journals or conferences.
Prepare a summary report on the project outcomes.
Create a presentation for stakeholders or interested parties.
